WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Amount
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClai.label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Net
LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClai.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of reserves for the costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims, net of estimated reinsurance recoveries.

LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClai.label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Net, Incurred Loss
LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClai.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClai.label: Liability for Asbestos and Environmental Claims, Net, Payment for Claims
LiabilityForAsbestosAndEnvironmentalClai.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.label: Payment for Debt Extinguishment or Debt Prepayment Cost
PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for cost from early extinguishment and prepayment of debt. Includes, but is not limited to, third-party cost, premium paid, and other fee paid to lender directly for debt extinguishment or debt prepayment. Excludes accrued interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, Tax, Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Noncurrent
DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeNotionalAmount.label: Derivative, Notional Amount
DerivativeNotionalAmount.description: Nominal or face amount used to calculate payment on derivative.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.
